setting.label: File download interval
setting.values: every start|12 hours|24 hours|48 hours|7 days|14 days

setting.label: Import addons.ini will overwrite added addon folders!
Sort Order for Channels in Categories
Use highest bandwidth stream from m3u url (Krypton+ fix)
Always Choose Channel if Alternative Streams Exist
Try Other Alternative Streams if Play Fails
